name: Magikoopa (Kamek) - base class
text:
Magikoopa (Kamek) Class - Full caster, Intelligence-based.
Features (Level 1):
- Hit Die: d6. HP at 1st: 6 + Con mod.
- Proficiencies: Saves Int, Cha. Weapons: Daggers, Slings, Quarterstaffs, Wands, Light Crossbows.
- Spellcasting: Wizard-like (spellbook, prepared spells).
- Chaotic Casting: Roll a d4 when casting 1st+ level spells for a minor effect.
- Trickster's Step: Bonus Action teleport 15 ft. Uses = Int mod + PB per long rest.
Includes all 3 subclasses: Grand Advisor, Arcane Prankster, Reality Shaper (details in separate entries).
